Are you the one who really likes taxing your brain, figuring things 'round and 'round till it hits the 
 
solution Puzzles fascinate you, right This is for you! Buckle up for the brain-bash! Run against the 
 
clock and crack your way out of the maze of numbers, alphabets, pictograms and anagrams before 
 
your friends does. Win cash prize every hour! 
 
Rules and Regulations: 
 
There will be 4-5 rounds of Puzzle Duzzle every day. 
 
 Starting from the time of announcement of a round, an hour's time will be given to the 
 
participants to crack the puzzles for the particular set. 
 
 Once a correct entry is received, the round will be declared closed. 
 
 Winner of each round will be awarded cash prize immediately. 
 
Judging parameters : 
 
Entries will be judged on the number of correct solutions and of course the time consumed if the 
 
round had not already been called off with an all correct entry before the one hour span is over.
